scripts.codegen:mda: npm run setup:mda && tsx scripts/codegen-project.ts mda
scripts.codegen:portal: npm run setup:portal && tsx scripts/codegen-project.ts portal
scripts.codegen:public-file: npm run setup:public-file && tsx scripts/codegen-project.ts public-file
scripts.load:quick: cd load-tests && python -m locust -f locustfiles/mda_with_auth.py --headless -u 5 -r 1 -t 30s --html reports/quick-test.html
scripts.load:headless: bash run-locust.sh quick_test "--headless -u 5 -r 1 -t 30s --html reports/test.html" || run-locust.cmd quick_test --headless -u 5 -r 1 -t 30s --html reports/test.html
scripts.load:ci:mda: cd load-tests && python -m locust -f locustfiles/mda_with_auth.py --headless -u 10 -r 2 -t 60s --html reports/mda-report.html
scripts.load:ci:portal: cd load-tests && python -m locust -f locustfiles/portal_with_auth.py --headless -u 20 -r 5 -t 60s --html reports/portal-report.html
scripts.load:ci:public-file: cd load-tests && python -m locust -f locustfiles/public_file_with_auth.py --headless -u 10 -r 2 -t 60s --html reports/public-file-report.html
scripts.load:stress: cd load-tests && python -m locust -f locustfiles/mda_with_auth.py --headless -u 50 -r 5 -t 120s --html reports/stress-test.html
scripts.test:mda:full: npm run setup:mda && npm run test:mda && npm run load:ci:mda
scripts.test:portal:full: npm run setup:portal && npm run test:portal && npm run load:ci:portal
scripts.test:public-file:full: npm run setup:public-file && npm run test:public-file && npm run load:ci:public-file
scripts.load:all: npm run load:ci:mda && npm run load:ci:portal && npm run load:ci:public-file
scripts.test:all:full: npm run test:mda:full && npm run test:portal:full && npm run test:public-file:full
